htds

Class Analyzer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JInternalFrame
            • htds.HTDSModule
              • htds.Analyzer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class Analyzer
extends HTDSModule
    This class analyzes the data by finding the repeating phone numbers, creating a corresponding alert, and uploading all the alerts to the alert database.
    Author:
    Zachary Oliveira NOTE: WHEN FINAL VERSION IS READY, COMMENT OUT THE HARD-CODED VALUES OF THRESHOLDS FOR ALERTS AND UNCOMMENT THE ADDING OF THE ALERTS TO THE ALERT ARRAY, AND UPLOADING THE ALERT ARRAY TO THE DATABASE
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • data

        private Data[] data
        An array of information uploaded by the agent. Each entry in the array holds phone numbers, victim names, id, log id, and a frequency.

      • theProfile

        private AlertProfile theProfile
        Contains data that determines the parameters of the alerts we create based on the number of repeats in our data

    • Method Detail

      • analyze

        public void analyze(Data[] dataArray)
        The method first sorts the data by putting the phone numbers in ascending order. Then, we go through the sorted list to see if there are duplicate phone numbers (all duplicates will be "side-by-side" in the array). Then we go through all the duplicate phone numbers and create alerts for each one that has more appearances than the minimal amount as listed in the alert profile, and upload the alerts to the database.
        Parameters:
        dataArray- - the data to be analyzed

      • uploadAlert

        public void uploadAlert(Alert[] alertArray)
        This method uploads an Array of alerts to the database
        Parameters:
        alertArray-The - array of alerts to be uploaded

      • getAlertProfile

        public AlertProfile getAlertProfile(int alertProfileID)
        This method retrieves the alert profile from the database of the alert of the ID given
        Parameters:
        alertProfileID: - The ID of which alert profile to retrieve from the database

      • getData

        public Data[] getData(int dataLogID)
        Gets the data from the database with the ID given
        Parameters:
        dataLogID- - The ID of which data to retrieve from the database
